Title: Three Sentences
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Joe Lawson, Bekah Brunstetter, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Jack and Rebecca throw three separate birthday parties; Toby helps Kevin with a romantic gesture; Kate gets a new plan; Randall helps William with his bucket list.
